DOC.brief_summary: Obesity overweight health problem result interaction predisposing gene environmental , economic social stimulus , conjunction excess caloric intake throughout growth childhood adulthood . ( Haworth , Plomin et al . 2008 ; Sinha Kling 2009 ) . Evidence suggest major barrier control overweight/obesity complex interrelation factor , make single-approach intervention less likely succeed integrate , multi-faceted approach ( Dobbins , De Corby et al . 2009 ) . The propose project aim deliver multi-faceted behavioral intervention develop past 18 month university-community /school-based collaborative . This project aim provide new knowledge effectiveness intervention design specifically achieve successful weight management among Mexican-origin child age 3-8 , identify associate mediate factor . Deliverables include community-based , collaborative sustainable tool support weight-management goal demographic . UC Davis UC Cooperative Extension ( UCCE ) faculty form investigator team , collaborate key decision point project community California 's Central Valley . The investigator hypothesize identified mediating factor increase fruit vegetable consumption . The investigator also hypothesize increase intensity frequency physical activity among child intervention group .
